import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { Router } from '@angular/router'; @Component({ selector: 'app-nav-menu', templateUrl: './nav-menu.component.html', styleUrls: ['./nav-menu.component.css'] }) export class NavMenuComponent { constructor(private router: Router) { } isLoggedIn() { return !!localStorage.getItem('user'); } logout() { localStorage.removeItem('user'); this.router.navigate(['/']); } }
